price: (37) Or have they the depositories [containing the provision] of your Lord? Or are they the controllers [of them]?
arabic: أَمۡ عِندَهُمۡ خَزَآئِنُ رَبِّكَ أَمۡ هُمُ ٱلۡمُصَۜيۡطِرُونَ

version.title: English Translation - Saheeh International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English - Saheeh International - Al-Muntada Al-Islami (Islamic Forum)

meta.transliteration: am ʿindahum khazāinu rabbika am humu al-muṣayṭirūna
